meanings.definition: Of or relating to the laity.
meanings.sent1: The laical members of the church attended the service.
meanings.sent2: She preferred a laical approach to spirituality.
meanings.sent3: The laical perspective on the church hierarchy was refreshing.
meanings.sent4: Her laical interpretation of the scripture shed new light on the text.
meanings.sent5: The laical duties of the congregation included organizing events.

meanings.sent1: As a laical, he was not ordained as a clergy member.
meanings.sent2: The laical provided valuable insights from a different perspective.
meanings.sent3: The laical's questions during the sermon kept everyone engaged.
meanings.sent4: She felt a sense of pride in her laical role within the community.
meanings.sent5: The laical's presence brought a sense of inclusivity to the group.
